blogPost.excerpt: Rarible is the first community-owned NFT marketplace. Create, sell or collect digital items secured with blockchain.
blogPost.body: Rarible is the first community-owned NFT marketplace. Create, sell or collect digital items secured with blockchain.
blogPost.title: Rarible - Create, sell, collect digital items secured with blockchain
blogPost.author: Gercek Armagan

localize.description: Rarible是第一个社区拥有的NFT市场。创建、出售或收集用区块链担保的数字项目。
localize.tagline: 创建、销售、收藏用区块链担保的数字项目。

localize.description: Rarible是第一個社區擁有的NFT市場。創建、出售或收集用區塊鏈擔保的數字項目。
localize.tagline: 創建、銷售、收藏用區塊鏈擔保的數字項目。

previous.excerpt: Minerva is the easiest way to capture and share clickable instructions for anything on the internet. No screenshots. No red arrows. No videos. Just step-by-step guidance. The Minerva Chrome extension lets you embed complex documentation into a URL!
previous.title: Minerva Pro - A better way to capture and share process online

localize.description: Minerva是捕捉和分享互联网上任何东西的可点击说明的最简单方法。没有屏幕截图，没有红色箭头。没有红色箭头。没有视频。只有一步步的指导。Minerva Chrome 浏览器扩展可以让您将复杂的文档嵌入到 URL 中。
localize.tagline: 更好的在线捕捉和分享过程的方法

localize.description: Minerva是捕捉和分享互聯網上任何東西的可點擊說明的最簡單方法。沒有屏幕截圖，沒有紅色箭頭。沒有紅色箭頭。沒有視頻。只有一步步的指導。Minerva Chrome 瀏覽器擴展可以讓您將複雜的文檔嵌入到 URL 中。
localize.tagline: 更好的在線捕捉和分享過程的方法

next.excerpt: Your favorite tool for sales, marketing, and customer support - erxes - is now available on the go. Keep the ball rolling at any time by managing deals, responding to messages, and updating your CRM. For busy days on the go, erxes mobile is the way to go.
next.title: erxes Mobile - Some of the most important CRM and web chat tools on the go
